verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H6918>them,<s%> 'You shall be holy; for I <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> am <S%H6918>holy.<s%>

<S%H376><s%>"'Each one of you shall <S%H3372>respect<s%> his <S%H517>mother<s%> and his <S%H1>father.<s%> You shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H7676>Sabbaths.<s%> I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
<S%H6437><s%>"'Don't turn to <S%H457>idols,<s%> nor <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> for <S%H3068>yourselves.<s%> I am Yahweh your <S%H430>God.<s%>
<S%H2076><s%>"'When you offer a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> you shall <S%H2076>offer<s%> it so that you may be <S%H7522>accepted.<s%>

It shall be <S%H398>eaten<s%> the same <S%H3117>day<s%> you <S%H2077>offer<s%> <S%H4283>it,<s%> and on the next day: and if anything <S%H3498>remains<s%> until the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> it shall be <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>
If it is <S%H398>eaten<s%> at <S%H398>all<s%> on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> it is an <S%H6292>abomination.<s%> It will not be <S%H7521>accepted;<s%>

but everyone who <S%H398>eats<s%> it shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> because he has <S%H2490>profaned<s%> the holy <S%H6944>thing<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and that <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

<S%H7114><s%>"'When you reap the <S%H7105>harvest<s%> of your <S%H776>land,<s%> you shall not wholly <S%H3615>reap<s%> the <S%H6285>corners<s%> of your <S%H7704>field,<s%> neither shall you <S%H3950>gather<s%> the <S%H3951>gleanings<s%> of your <S%H7105>harvest.<s%>

You shall not <S%H5953>glean<s%> your <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> neither shall you <S%H3950>gather<s%> the fallen <S%H6528>grapes<s%> of your <S%H3754>vineyard;<s%> you shall <S%H5800>leave<s%> them for the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and for the <S%H1616>foreigner.<s%> I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
<S%H1589><s%>"'You shall not steal. <S%H8266><s%>"'You shall not lie. <S%H8266><s%>"'You shall not deceive <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H5997>another.<s%>
<S%H7650><s%>"'You shall not swear by my <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8267>falsely,<s%> and <S%H2490>profane<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of your <S%H430>God.<s%> I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H6231><s%>"'You shall not oppress your <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> nor <S%H1497>rob<s%> <S%H6468>him.<s%> "'The wages of a <S%H7916>hired<s%> servant shall not <S%H3885>remain<s%> with you all night until the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

<S%H7043><s%>"'You shall not curse the <S%H2795>deaf,<s%> nor <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H4383>stumbling<s%> block <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5787>blind;<s%> but you shall <S%H3372>fear<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%> I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H6213><s%>"'You shall do no <S%H5766>injustice<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment:<s%> you shall not be <S%H5375>partial<s%> to <S%H6440>the<s%> <S%H1800>poor,<s%> nor show <S%H1921>favoritism<s%> to <S%H6440>the<s%> <S%H1419>great;<s%> but you shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> your <S%H5997>neighbor<s%> in <S%H6664>righteousness.<s%>

<S%H3212><s%>"'You shall not go up and down as a <S%H7400>slanderer<s%> among your <S%H5971>people.<s%> <S%H5975><s%>"'You shall not endanger the <S%H1818>life<s%> of your <S%H7453>neighbor.<s%> I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H8130><s%>"'You shall not hate your <S%H251>brother<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart.<s%> You shall <S%H3198>surely<s%> <S%H3198>rebuke<s%> your <S%H5997>neighbor,<s%> and not <S%H5375>bear<s%> sin because of <S%H2399>him.<s%>

<S%H5358><s%>"'You shall not take vengeance, nor bear any <S%H5201>grudge<s%> against the <S%H1121>children<s%> of your <S%H5971>people;<s%> but you shall <S%H157>love<s%> your <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> as <S%H3644>yourself.<s%> I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H8104><s%>"'You shall keep my <S%H2708>statutes.<s%> <S%H7250><s%>"'You shall not crossbreed different <S%H3610>kinds<s%> of <S%H929>animals.<s%> <S%H2232><s%>"'you shall not sow your <S%H7704>field<s%> with two kinds of <S%H3610>seed;<s%> <S%H5927><s%>"'neither shall there come upon on you a <S%H899>garment<s%> made of <S%H3610>two<s%> kinds of <S%H8162>material.<s%>

<S%H376><s%>"'If a man <S%H7901>lies<s%> <S%H2233>carnally<s%> with a <S%H802>woman<s%> who is a <S%H8198>slave<s%> <S%H2778>girl,<s%> pledged to be married to another <S%H376>man,<s%> and <S%H6299>not<s%> <S%H6299>ransomed,<s%> or <S%H5414>given<s%> her <S%H2668>freedom;<s%> they shall be <S%H1244>punished.<s%> They shall not be put to <S%H4191>death,<s%> because she was not <S%H2666>free.<s%>

He shall <S%H935>bring<s%> his trespass <S%H817>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> even a <S%H352>ram<s%> for a trespass <S%H817>offering.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him with the <S%H352>ram<s%> of the trespass <S%H817>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> for his <S%H2403>sin<s%> which he has <S%H2398>committed:<s%> and the <S%H2403>sin<s%> which he has <S%H2398>committed<s%> shall be forgiven <S%H5545>him.<s%>

<S%H935><s%>"'When you come into the <S%H776>land,<s%> and have <S%H5193>planted<s%> all kinds of <S%H6086>trees<s%> for <S%H3978>food,<s%> then you shall <S%H6188>count<s%> their <S%H6529>fruit<s%> as <S%H6188>forbidden.<s%> <S%H7969>Three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> shall they be <S%H6189>forbidden<s%> to <S%H398>you.<s%> It shall not be eaten.
But in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> all its <S%H6529>fruit<s%> shall be <S%H6944>holy,<s%> for giving <S%H1974>praise<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

In the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> its <S%H6529>fruit,<s%> that it may <S%H3254>yield<s%> its <S%H8393>increase<s%> to <S%H3068>you.<s%> I am Yahweh your <S%H430>God.<s%>
<S%H398><s%>"'You shall not eat any meat with the <S%H1818>blood<s%> still in <S%H5172>it;<s%> neither shall you use enchantments, nor practice <S%H6049>sorcery.<s%>
<S%H5362><s%>"'You shall not cut the hair on the <S%H6285>sides<s%> of your <S%H7218>heads,<s%> neither shall you <S%H7843>clip<s%> off the <S%H6285>edge<s%> of your <S%H2206>beard.<s%>

<S%H5414><s%>"'You shall not make <S%H3793>any<s%> <S%H8296>cuttings<s%> in your <S%H1320>flesh<s%> for the <S%H5315>dead,<s%> nor <S%H5414>tattoo<s%> any <S%H7085>marks<s%> on <S%H3068>you.<s%> I am Yahweh.

<S%H2490><s%>"'Don't profane your <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> to make her a <S%H2490>prostitute;<s%> lest the <S%H776>land<s%> fall to <S%H2181>prostitution,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> become <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H2154>wickedness.<s%>
<S%H8104><s%>"'You shall keep my <S%H7676>Sabbaths,<s%> and <S%H3372>reverence<s%> my <S%H4720>sanctuary;<s%> I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H6437><s%>"'Don't turn to those who are <S%H178>mediums,<s%> nor to the <S%H3049>wizards.<s%> <S%H1245>Don't<s%> seek them <S%H2930>out,<s%> to be defiled by <S%H3068>them.<s%> I am Yahweh your <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H6965><s%>"'You shall rise up <S%H6440>before<s%> the gray <S%H7872>head,<s%> and <S%H1921>honor<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of an old <S%H2205>man,<s%> and you shall <S%H3372>fear<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%> I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
<S%H1616><s%>"'If a stranger lives as a <S%H1616>foreigner<s%> with you in your <S%H776>land,<s%> you shall not do him <S%H3238>wrong.<s%>

The <S%H1616>stranger<s%> who <S%H1481>lives<s%> as a foreigner with you shall be to you as the <S%H249>native-born<s%> among <S%H157>you,<s%> and you shall love him as <S%H1616>yourself;<s%> for you lived as foreigners in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
<S%H6213><s%>"'You shall do no <S%H5766>unrighteousness<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> in <S%H4884>measures<s%> of <S%H4948>length,<s%> of weight, or of <S%H4884>quantity.<s%>

You shall have <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H3976>balances,<s%> <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H68>weights,<s%> a <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H374>ephah,<s%> and a <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H1969>hin.<s%> I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> who brought you <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
<S%H8104><s%>"'You shall observe all my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and all my <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3068>them.<s%> I am Yahweh.'"
